TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IssuedSecurityTokenProvider extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider implements class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Class IssuedSecurityTokenProvider Inherits SecurityTokenProvider Implements ICommunicationObject
type IssuedSecurityTokenProvider = class inherit SecurityTokenProvider interface ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 表示已發行的安全性權杖的權杖提供者。

span.span: Represents a token provider for issued security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當快取和重複使用由 方法傳回的安全性權杖時，必須特別小心；因為安全性權杖可能會在關閉與權杖提供者關聯的通道時變成無法使用。Care must be taken when caching and reusing security tokens that are returned from the method, because the security token might become unusable when the channel that the token provider is associated with is closed. 如果要求的金鑰類型為非對稱，而且當呼叫 方法時執行緒正在模擬的內容中執行，安全性權杖就會變成無法使用。The security token becomes unusable when the requested key type is asymmetric and the thread is running under impersonated context when the method is called.

span.span: A after which the call times out.

summary.span: 取得權杖核心。

span.span: Gets the token core.
The that represents the token core.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當快取和重複使用由 方法傳回的安全性權杖時，必須特別小心；因為安全性權杖可能會在關閉與權杖提供者關聯的通道時變成無法使用。Care must be taken when caching and reusing security tokens that are returned from the method, because the security token might become unusable when the channel that the token provider is associated with is closed. 如果要求的金鑰類型為非對稱，而且當呼叫 方法時執行緒正在模擬的內容中執行，安全性權杖就會變成無法使用。The security token becomes unusable when the requested key type is asymmetric and the thread is running under impersonated context when the method is called.

summary.span: 取得或設定身分識別驗證器。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity verifier.
The identity verifier.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int IssuedTokenRenewalThresholdPercentage { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定核發之權杖的更新臨界值百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the issued token renewal threshold percentage.

value.span: 核發之權杖的更新臨界值百分比。

span.span: The issued token renewal threshold percentage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個百分比可以控制權杖提供者連絡 SecurityTokenService 以取得新核發之權杖的頻率。This percentage controls how often the token provider contacts the SecurityTokenService for a new issued token. 例如，如果百分比為 90 %，權杖提供者將會在經過所核發權杖之有效期間的 90 % 時連絡 SecurityTokenService。For example, if the percentage is 90 percent, then the token provider will contact the SecurityTokenService when 90 percent of the issued token's validity interval is over.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IssuerChannelBehaviors As KeyedByTypeCollection(Of IEndpointBehavior)

summary.span: 取得簽發者通道行為。

span.span: Gets the issuer channel behaviors.
A that contains the behaviors for the issuer channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些通道行為會加入至權杖提供者用來連繫 SecurityTokenService 的通道。These channel behaviors are added to the channel used by the token provider for the SecurityTokenService. 這個集合的金鑰是安全性權杖服務的 URL。The key for this collection is the URL of the security token service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityKeyEntropyMode KeyEntropyMode { System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityKeyEntropyMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityKeyEntropyMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定金鑰 Entropy 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the key entropy mode.
The key entropy mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是權杖提供者在與 SecurityTokenService 交涉對稱金鑰時，用來搭配核發的權杖的金鑰 Entropy 模式。This property is the key entropy mode used by the token provider when negotiating a symmetric key with the SecurityTokenService to use with the issued token.

span.span: Gets or sets the security algorithm suite.
The security algorithm suite.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的 物件含有許多可用來指定在特定情況下使用之安全性演算法的屬性。The object that is returned contains numerous properties that specify security algorithms to use in specific conditions. 它還會描述服務的各種安全性功能。It also describes various security capabilities of the service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TokenRequestParameters As Collection(Of XmlElement)

summary.span: 取得權杖要求參數。

span.span: Gets the token request parameters.

value.span: XML 項目的集合，表示權杖要求參數。

span.span: A collection of XML elements that represent the token request parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 XML 項目的集合，權杖提供者會附上這些項目做為傳送給 SecurityTokenService 之 RequestSecurityToken 的一部分。This is a collection of XML elements that the token provider includes as part of the RequestSecurityToken it sends to the SecurityTokenService. 這些參數可以由用戶端明確地設定，也可以從信賴憑證者的安全性原則取得。These parameters can be set explicitly by the client or can be obtained from the relying party's security policy.
